item.title: Character Template
item.description: Character Template Refer to pg. 55 of the core rules book. Character Summary (Name, Background, Age, etc.) Lorem ipsum dolor est. Ancestry Human.

item.title: Renaissance
item.description: Renaissance Runeographers largely avoided applying Gem energy to organic matter due to the threat of Crystallization, but the gem families seeking to expand their influence would pressure their sponsored runeographers & Inscriptionists into beginning experiments leveraging the control they gaine...

item.title: Strain
item.description: Strain The stress imparted on matter when Gem energy is being channeled.

item.title: Gem
item.description: Gem A concentrated collection of energy capable of enhancing or empowering both organic and inorganic matter.

item.title: Projection
item.description: Projection The physical manifestation of a Gem’s raw energy in the form of hardlight. The appearance and behavior of the hardlight depends on Runes.

item.title: Setting Mechanics
item.description: Setting Mechanics Rolls (Core pg. 87) Aces (exploding dice) apply to any Trait, damage roll, and wild die. Raises apply on any Trait roll.

item.title: Emerald
item.description: Emerald Power Emerald has the Intrinsic Power of manipulating organic matter. Although useful for more other tasks, they’re mainly used for healing.

item.title: Crystalborne
item.description: Crystalborne A collection of notes exploring an original setting and documenting a campaign run within the setting.

item.title: Intro
item.description: Intro This section of notes is specifically related to a TTRPG campaign run within the Crystalborne setting.

item.title: Tinkerer's Guild
item.description: Tinkerer’s Guild A guild regulating the distribution and management of Gems within the Deepcrystal Enclave for the purpose of experimentation and development by Inscriptionists and Runeographer.
